text: Dana George Mead (February 22, 1936 - October 31, 2018) was an American businessman and corporate director. He was born in Cresco, Iowa. Mead was chairman emeritus of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology Foundation's board of trustees, where he was chairman from 2003 through 2010. Mead died in Boston, Massachusetts on October 31, 2018 at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * MIT Corporation homepage * Pfizer Corporation homepage * Dana Mead Playlist Appearance on WMBR's Dinnertime Sampler radio show April 28, 2004 Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American political scientists Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:Writers from Boston Category:Writers from Iowa
title: Dana G. Mead
